languageModelTools.name: testAwsConnection
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Tests AWS connectivity using STS GetCallerIdentity. Returns true if the connection is successful.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Test your AWS connectivity with current session credentials

region.description: The AWS region to test. If not specified, uses the current session region.

languageModelTools.name: session
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get or set AWS session values (AwsProfile, AwsEndPoint, AwsRegion). Use command GetSession to read current values. Use SetSession with params to update any of AwsProfile, AwsEndPoint, AwsRegion.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage AWS session profile, endpoint, and region

command.description: Use GetSession to read current values. Use SetSession to update session values.

params.description: Parameters for SetSession. Omit to leave unchanged.

AwsRegion.description: AWS region to set (optional, default us-east-1 if set to empty)

languageModelTools.name: s3
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute S3 commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListObjectsV2 {command:'ListObjectsV2', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. PutObject {command:'PutObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path', Body:'content'}}. DeleteObject {command:'DeleteObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path'}}. CopyObject {command:'CopyObject', params:{Bucket:'name', CopySource:'/bucket/key', Key:'new-path'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Execute S3 commands including read, write, and delete operations

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. For write operations ensure Bucket and Key are provided.

Bucket.description: Bucket name (REQUIRED for all commands except ListBuckets)

Key.description: Object key path (REQUIRED for HeadObject, PutObject, DeleteObject, CopyObject)

CopySource.description: Source object path for copy command (REQUIRED for CopyObject, format: /bucket/key)

Body.description: Object content as string or base64 (optional for PutObject)

ContentType.description: MIME type for the object (optional for PutObject)

Prefix.description: Filter objects by prefix path (optional for ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions)

Delimiter.description: Delimiter character for grouping keys, typically / (optional)

MaxKeys.description: Maximum number of keys to return (optional, default 1000)

ContinuationToken.description: Token for pagination from previous response (optional)

StartAfter.description: Start listing after this key name (optional)

VersionId.description: Specific version ID of object (optional for HeadObject, DeleteObject)

KeyMarker.description: Key marker for version pagination (optional for ListObjectVersions)

VersionIdMarker.description: Version ID marker for pagination (optional for ListObjectVersions)

Metadata.description: Custom metadata key-value pairs (optional for PutObject, CopyObject)

MetadataDirective.description: How to handle metadata in CopyObject: COPY or REPLACE (optional)

languageModelTools.name: fileOperations
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Perform file operations: ReadFile to read file content, ReadFileStream to get file metadata, ReadFileAsBase64 to read as Base64, GetFileInfo to get file statistics, ListFiles to list directory contents, ZipTextFile to create a zip archive of a file or directory.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Read and manage files with various encoding and format options

command.description: The file operation command to execute

params.description: Command parameters. ReadFile: {filePath, encoding?}. ReadFileStream: {filePath}. ReadFileAsBase64: {filePath}. GetFileInfo: {filePath}. ListFiles: {dirPath, recursive?}. ZipTextFile: {filePath, outputPath?}

filePath.description: File path (required for ReadFile, ReadFileStream, ReadFileAsBase64, GetFileInfo, ZipTextFile)

encoding.description: File encoding for ReadFile (optional, default: utf8). Examples: utf8, ascii, base64, utf16le

recursive.description: Recursively list files in subdirectories (optional for ListFiles, default: false)

outputPath.description: Custom output path for zip file (optional for ZipTextFile, default: temp directory)

languageModelTools.name: cloudWatchLogs
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute CloudWatch Logs commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: DescribeLogGroups {command:'DescribeLogGroups', params:{logGroupNamePrefix:'app'}}. DescribeLogStreams {command:'DescribeLogStreams', params:{logGroupName:'my-group'}}. GetLogEvents {command:'GetLogEvents', params:{logGroupName:'my-group', logStreamName:'stream', limit:50}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Query CloudWatch log groups, streams, and events

command.description: The CloudWatch Logs command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide logGroupName/logStreamName where needed.

logGroupNamePrefix.description: Prefix filter for log group names (optional for DescribeLogGroups)

logGroupName.description: Target log group name (required for DescribeLogStreams, GetLogEvents)

logStreamNamePrefix.description: Prefix filter for log stream names (optional for DescribeLogStreams)

descending.description: Whether to sort descending for DescribeLogStreams (optional)

limit.description: Maximum items to return where supported (optional)

logStreamName.description: Target log stream name (required for GetLogEvents)

startTime.description: Start time in epoch milliseconds (optional for GetLogEvents)

endTime.description: End time in epoch milliseconds (optional for GetLogEvents)

startFromHead.description: Return events starting from the beginning of the stream (optional for GetLogEvents)

languageModelTools.name: lambda
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Lambda commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListFunctions {command:'ListFunctions', params:{MaxItems:10}}. GetFunction {command:'GetFunction', params:{FunctionName:'my-function'}}. Invoke {command:'Invoke', params:{FunctionName:'my-function', Payload:'{"key":"value"}'}}
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and invoke AWS Lambda functions

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

FunctionName.description: Lambda function name or ARN (REQUIRED for GetFunction, GetFunctionConfiguration, UpdateFunctionCode, Invoke)

FunctionVersion.description: Set to ALL to include all versions (optional for ListFunctions)

Marker.description: Pagination marker from previous response (optional for ListFunctions)

MaxItems.description: Maximum number of functions to return (optional for ListFunctions)

MasterRegion.description: For Lambda@Edge, the AWS Region of the master function (optional)

ZipFile.description: Base64-encoded zip file containing function code (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

S3Bucket.description: S3 bucket containing the function code (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

S3Key.description: S3 object key for the function code (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

ImageUri.description: URI of a container image in Amazon ECR (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

Publish.description: Publish a new version after updating code (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

DryRun.description: Validate the request without updating code (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

RevisionId.description: Update only if revision ID matches (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

Architectures.description: Instruction set architecture: x86_64 or arm64 (optional for UpdateFunctionCode)

Resource.description: Function ARN (REQUIRED for ListTags, TagResource, UntagResource)

Tags.description: Key-value pairs for tags (REQUIRED for TagResource)

TagKeys.description: Tag keys to remove (REQUIRED for UntagResource)

InvocationType.description: Invocation type (optional for Invoke, default: RequestResponse)

LogType.description: Set to Tail to include execution log in response (optional for Invoke)

ClientContext.description: Base64-encoded client context data (optional for Invoke)

Payload.description: JSON string payload to pass to function (optional for Invoke)

languageModelTools.name: stepfunc
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Step Functions commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListStateMachines {command:'ListStateMachines', params:{maxResults:10}}. StartExecution {command:'StartExecution', params:{stateMachineArn:'arn:aws:states:...', input:'{\"key\":\"value\"}'}}. DescribeExecution {command:'DescribeExecution', params:{executionArn:'arn:aws:states:...'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and run AWS Step Functions state machines

command.description: The Step Functions command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide stateMachineArn/executionArn as needed.

stateMachineArn.description: State machine ARN (REQUIRED for DescribeStateMachine, StartExecution, UpdateStateMachine; optional for ListExecutions)

maxResults.description: Maximum items to return where supported (optional)

statusFilter.description: Filter executions by status (optional for ListExecutions)

input.description: JSON string input for execution (optional for StartExecution)

definition.description: State machine definition in Amazon States Language (optional for UpdateStateMachine)

roleArn.description: IAM role ARN for the state machine (optional for UpdateStateMachine)

publish.description: Set true to publish a new version (optional for UpdateStateMachine)

versionDescription.description: Description for the published version (optional for UpdateStateMachine)

languageModelTools.name: glue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Glue commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListJobs {command:'ListJobs', params:{MaxResults:10}}. CreateJob {command:'CreateJob', params:{Name:'my-job', Role:'arn:aws:iam::...:role/...', Command:{Name:'glueetl'}}}. StartJobRun {command:'StartJobRun', params:{JobName:'my-job'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and run AWS Glue ETL jobs and triggers

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide Name/JobName/ResourceArn as needed.

Name.description: Job or trigger name (REQUIRED for CreateJob, GetJob, GetTrigger, StartJobRun)

JobName.description: Job name (REQUIRED for GetJobRun, GetJobRuns, StartJobRun)

Command.description: Command configuration object (REQUIRED for CreateJob, should include Name property)

LogUri.description: S3 URI for job logs (optional for CreateJob)

AllocatedCapacity.description: Allocated capacity for the job run (optional)

DependencyJobName.description: Filter by dependent job name (optional for GetTriggers)

DependentJobName.description: Filter by dependent job name (optional for ListTriggers)

languageModelTools.name: iam
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS IAM commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: GetRole {command:'GetRole', params:{RoleName:'my-role'}}. ListAttachedRolePolicies {command:'ListAttachedRolePolicies', params:{RoleName:'my-role'}}. GetPolicyVersion {command:'GetPolicyVersion', params:{PolicyArn:'arn:aws:iam::123:policy/p', VersionId:'v1'}}.

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide RoleName/PolicyArn as needed.

RoleName.description: Target IAM role name (REQUIRED for GetRole, GetRolePolicy, ListAttachedRolePolicies, ListRolePolicies, ListRoleTags)

PathPrefix.description: Path prefix to filter results (optional for ListAttachedRolePolicies, ListRoles, ListPolicies)

MaxItems.description: Maximum items to return (optional where supported)

PolicyArn.description: IAM policy ARN (REQUIRED for GetPolicy, GetPolicyVersion, ListPolicyVersions)

OnlyAttached.description: Set true to list only attached policies (optional for ListPolicies)

PolicyUsageFilter.description: Filter policies by usage (optional for ListPolicies)

commands.title: Aws AI Assistant:Set Default AWS Region

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
